net.sf.ntru.encrypt

Class PassphraseBasedPRNG

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • net.sf.ntru.encrypt.PassphraseBasedPRNG
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PassphraseBasedPRNG
extends java.util.Random
    Deterministic random number generator initialized from a passphrase.
    This class is not thread safe.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PassphraseBasedPRNG(char[] passphrase, byte[] salt)
      Creates a new PassphraseBasedPRNG from a passphrase and salt, and seeds it with the output of PBKDF2.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PassphraseBasedPRNG createBranch()
      Creates a new PassphraseBasedPRNG whose output differs but is a function of this PassphraseBasedPRNG's internal state.
      int next(int bits)

    • Constructor Detail

      • PassphraseBasedPRNG

        public PassphraseBasedPRNG(char[] passphrase,
                   byte[] salt)
        Creates a new PassphraseBasedPRNG from a passphrase and salt, and seeds it with the output of PBKDF2.
        PBKDF2 is intentionally slow, so this constructor should not be called more than is necessary.
        Parameters:
        passphrase -
        salt -
        Throws:
        NtruException - if the JRE doesn't implement SHA-512

    • Method Detail

      • createBranch

        public PassphraseBasedPRNG createBranch()
        Creates a new PassphraseBasedPRNG whose output differs but is a function of this PassphraseBasedPRNG's internal state.
        This method does not call PBKDF2 and thus does not take nearly as long as the constructor.
        Returns:
        a new PassphraseBasedPRNG
        Throws:
        NtruException - if the JRE doesn't implement SHA-512

      • next

        public int next(int bits)
        Overrides:
        next in class java.util.Random
